1 - prominent (text).description:
usage in content:
- use for title.

usage in component:
- for item that we want user to focus
  * in component with title and content, title would be in "2 - general" and content "1 - prominent".

2 - general (text).description:
usage in content:
- use for paragraph.

usage in component:
- for item that we want user to focus
  * in component with title and content, title would be in "2 - general" and content "1 - prominent".

3 - less prominent (text).description:
for things that is not that important, but we still want to show it in UI.

for e.g:
- helper text.
- account ID below account name.

4 - disabled (text).description: as the name suggest, it's for disabled state.

5 - active (background).description:
- background color for active state for list
- border color

7 - secondary (background).description:
background color for:
- section
- modal
- bottom sheet
